com.st.BlueSTSDK

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NodeEmulator

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent an object that can export some data (feature) using the ble connection

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Node.BleConnectionParamUpdateListener
      Interface used for notify change on the ble connection
      static interface  Node.NodeStateListener
      Interface where notify that the node change its internal state
      static class  Node.State
      State of the node
      static class  Node.Type
      Node type: type the board that is advertising connection

      • Node

        public Node(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
            int rssi,
            byte[] advertise)
     throws InvalidBleAdvertiseFormat
        create a new node
        Parameters:
        device - android ble device
        rssi - rssi of the advertise message
        advertise - advertise message for this node
        Throws:
        InvalidBleAdvertiseFormat - if the advertise is not well formed

      • Node

        public Node(byte[] advertise)
     throws InvalidBleAdvertiseFormat
        create a new node from the advertise, the advertise have to contain the mac address
        Parameters:
        advertise - advertise message for this node
        Throws:
        InvalidBleAdvertiseFormat - if the advertise is not well formed, for this method is mandatory that the advertise contains also the mac address

      • connect

        public void connect(android.content.Context c,

      • connect

        public void connect(android.content.Context c,
                    boolean resetCache,
                    @Nullable
                    java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Feature>>> userDefineFeature)
        open a gatt connection
        Parameters:
        c - context to use for open the connection
        resetCache - if true the handle cache for this device will be clear, the connection will be slower, it will done only the first time that you call this function with the parameter true
        userDefineFeature - register the UUID in the map as know UUID that will be manage by the node class as feature

      • addExternalCharacteristics

        public void addExternalCharacteristics(@Nullable
                                       java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Feature>>> userDefineFeature)
        describe as manage some specific UUID using a feature class, the uuid will be manage by the node class only if is know before the connection if a uuid is already know it will be overwrite with the new list of feature
        Parameters:
        userDefineFeature - map that link the uuid with the features that contains.

      • getFeatures

        public java.util.List<Feature> getFeatures()

      • getFeatures

        @NonNull
public <T extends Feature> java.util.List<T> getFeatures(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        return a list of feature of a specific type
        Type Parameters:
        T - class that will want search
        Parameters:
        type - type of feature that we want search
        Returns:
        all the features of type type exported by this node, or an empty list

      • addBleConnectionParamListener
